Package net.apartium.cocoabeans.scoreboard

Interface ViewerGroup<P>

Type Parameters:
P - type of Player (Spigot/Minestom/etc...)
@AvailableSince("0.0.41") public interface ViewerGroup<P>
BoardPlayerGroup is group of player that are able to see the packets we send
